DOC.brief_title: Safety Cost-Effectiveness Early Maternal Newborn Infant Discharge
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial design assess safety policy early maternal newborn infant discharge compare policy routine discharge 2 3 day delivery . The primary outcome newborn admission Level II Level III neonatal care unit hospital within three day delivery . Secondary outcome include admission readmission 2 week , 6 week 6 month follow delivery , maternal satisfaction length stay overall birthing experience , lactation continuation rate , maternal anxiety , depression , confidence family function . We apply American Academy Pediatrics criterion early newborn discharge , plan analysis intention treat .
